metrics.name: Time from Production Order to SFC Creation
metrics.description: Avg Time taken from Production Order creation to Shop Floor Control creation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = ('Create Shop Floor Control'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = ('Create Production Order'))))
   )

children.name: Get an Overview of your DM Operate Manufacturing Process

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of your DM Operate Manufacturing process. It highlights some key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas to investigate further.
Page 1: Discovery - A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths.
Page 3: Analysis- High-level analysis of key use cases
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

children.name: Total Number of Orders
children.description: Total Orders

children.name: Order Scrapped Quantity
children.description: Scrapped/Rejected quantities from Order

children.name: Order Received Quantity
children.description: Goods Receipt Quantity

children.name: Delayed time at Order start
children.description: Average difference between actual start and scheduled start of order

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
	"Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start") 
    FILTER( WHERE "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes' )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cycle Time for Specific Routing Step [to be customized]
children.description: Definition: Average time between 'Start paint' step and 'Complete paint' step

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG ((SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER 
(WHERE EVENT_NAME LIKE 'Complete %Paint%')) - 
(SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER 
(WHERE EVENT_NAME LIKE 'Start %Paint%'))) FROM THIS_PROCESS
-- please adjust to the routing step to be analyzed

children.name: Time taken for Production Order to SFC Creation
children.description: Definition : Time taken from Production Order creation to SFC creation

children.name: Orders with SFC Activities not started
children.description: Orders with SFC Activities not started

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  count("case_id")
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT case_id,
      COUNT(DISTINCT "event_name") AS cnt
    FROM
      FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
    GROUP BY
      1
  ) AS T
WHERE
  cnt = 2

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Definition: Average time between 'Create Production Order' and 'Post Goods Receipt'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Receipt'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Production Order'))))      
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Production Order' ~> 'Post Goods Receipt')

children.name: Number of Orders Delayed in Start
children.description: Number of orders where the actual start is delayed

dataSource.query:
SELECT
   count(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Order Actual Start" IS NOT NULL
	AND "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes') 
FROM
   THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Delay Rate
children.description: Definition : % of cases that deviate from their scheduled timing.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
   COUNT(distinct "case_id")  FILTER(
	WHERE "Order Actual Start" IS NOT NULL
	AND "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes')  
/count("case_id") * 100
FROM
   THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Orders Manufactured On Time
children.description: Orders that were manufactured on time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
   COUNT(distinct "case_id") AS OnTimeManufacturing
FROM
   THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE
"Order Actual Start" <= "Order Planned Start" AND
"Order Actual Completion" <= "Order Planned Completion"

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of manufacturing events

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
^ 'Create Production Order'
~> 'Create Shop Floor Control'
~> LIKE 'Start Step%'
~> LIKE 'Complete Step%'
~> 'Post Goods Receipt'
)) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Conformance level"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Defect Rate
children.description: % of Scrapped quantities against total quantity

dataSource.query:
SELECT
SUM("Order Scrapped Quantity") / 
(SUM("Order Scrapped Quantity")+SUM("Order Build Quantity")) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Completed Orders
children.description: Production order deliveries status – 100% completed

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) FROM THIS_PROCESS where
"Order Execution Status" ='COMPLETED'

children.name: % Order Completion
children.description: Definition : % of Orders that are completed from the Total number of Orders

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) FILTER
(WHERE "Order Execution Status" ='COMPLETED' 
AND "Order Release Status" ='RELEASED') / COUNT("case_id")
*100
 FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Partially Completed Orders
children.description: Orders that are not completed and GR quantity is available

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE 
"Order Execution Status"!='COMPLETED' AND "Order Received Quantity" > 0

children.name: Work in Progress Time [to be customized]
children.description: Average time between completion of specific steps, for example step 10 and step 20

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	FILTER( WHERE event_name LIKE 'Start%' AND "Routing Step" ='0020'))
- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	FILTER( WHERE event_name LIKE 'Complete%' AND "Routing Step" ='0010'))
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: First Pass Yield Rate
children.description: SFC Build Quantity that don't have NC logged against total SFC GR Quantity

dataSource.query:
SELECT SUM("SFC Build Quantity") FILTER 
(WHERE "SFC Routing Type" != 'NC') /
SUM("SFC Received Quantity")

FROM flatten(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Definition: the time between 'Create Production Order' and 'Post Goods Receipt'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Receipt'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Production Order'))))      
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Production Order' ~> 'Post Goods Receipt')

children.name: Order Received v/s Order Build Quantity

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('YEAR', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Year",
SUM ("Order Received Quantity") AS "Order Received Quantity",
SUM ("Order Build Quantity" ) AS "Order Build Quantity"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('YEAR')

children.name: Order Received v/s Order Scrapped Quantity

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('YEAR', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Year",
SUM ("Order Received Quantity" ) AS "Order Received Quantity",
SUM ("Order Scrapped Quantity" ) AS "Order Scrapped Quantity"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('YEAR')

children.name: Order Received Quantity
children.description: Good Receipt Quantity

children.name: Order Scrapped Quantity
children.description: Scrapped/Rejected Quantity

children.name: Delayed time at Order start
children.description: Average difference between actual start and scheduled start of order

dataSource.query:
SELECT
   AVG(
	"Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start") 
    FILTER( WHERE "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes' )  AS delay
 FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average Delay Over time
children.description: Average Delay Over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('year', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Year", 
AVG(
	"Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start") 
    FILTER( WHERE "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes' ) AS Delay
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('YEAR'), NULL

children.name: Delay Rate
children.description: Definition : % of cases that deviate from their expected or scheduled timing.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
   COUNT(distinct "case_id")  FILTER(
	WHERE "Order Actual Start" IS NOT NULL
	AND "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes')  
/count("case_id") * 100
FROM
   THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of manufacturing events

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
^'Create Production Order'
~> 'Create Shop Floor Control'
~> LIKE 'Start Step%'
~> LIKE 'Complete Step%'
~> 'Post Goods Receipt'
)) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Conformance level"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Rate over time
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of manufacturing events

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('year', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Year",
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (^
'Create Production Order'
~> 'Create Shop Floor Control'
~> LIKE 'Start Step%'
~> LIKE 'Complete Step%'
~> 'Post Goods Receipt')) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Conformance Rate%"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('YEAR'), NULL

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('year', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Production Order')))) AS "Order Creation Date",
    
    AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Post Goods Receipt')))
   	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Production Order')))) AS "Average cycle time"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Production Order' ~> 'Post Goods Receipt')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('YEAR'), NULL

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('year', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Year", 
COUNT (DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (WHERE "Order Actual Start" 
IS NOT NULL AND "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes') / COUNT ("case_id") * 100
as "Delay Rate %"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('YEAR'), NULL
